desc.p: Holds the locking date.
Any back-date contract made prior to locking date does not affect the valuation and performance details until this date.
Instead, the effect of the back dated contract reflects from next working day after the locking date.
Specifies the print category either discretionary or managed client.
Validations

p.span: Specifies the type of print to choose for printing.

desc.p: Validations
Options allowed are:

p.p: Final - updates the fields SCHEDULE, PRITING.DATE, PRITING.TYPE, and LAST.RPTD.PRD NEXT.PRD.START to next printing cycle in WR.KYR.INFO

desc.p: Description
Specifies the printing date.
Validations

p.span: Populates the dates and printing parameters from WR.REPORT.BOOK

desc.p: Validations
Specifies the date from which details needs to be reported to the client.
System generated date based on the frequency mentioned in the Schedule field and is considered as the end date for reporting.
It is a multi-value and a mandatory field.
This field can be amended, but the date should not be less than what is mentioned in WR.KYR.LAST.RPTD.PRD field.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Specifies the last date at which the transactions were reported and considers as a start date for reporting.
It is a multi-value and a mandatory field.
This field can be amended, but the date must not be less than the date mentioned in WR.KYR.NEXT.PRD.START field.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Specifies the address of the person to send the report.
It is a Multi-value field which accepts value as any ID from the DE.ADDRESS application.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Calculates the performance of the group for each month, between the start date and end date.
Done either in the WR.REQUEST.REPORT or the LAST.RPTD.PRD and NEXT.PRD.START in the record WR.KYR.INFO with the performance of benchmark calculated for the same period.
Benchmark id is fetched from the application AM.GROUP.PORT for the respective group.
Specifies the number of copies that are sent to the above address and printed in the Orchestrate.
It is a Multivalue field which accepts any numeric value.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
